Text: Reggie Harding:  Drafted in 1962 by the Detroit Pistons, Harding is noted as the first player drafted into the NBA without having played in college, Harding spent five years in the NBA; playing for the Detroit Pistons, Chicago Bulls and later the Indiana Pacers.

<Text: Reggie Harding:  Harding also played for the Trenton Colonials which was apart of the Continental Basketball Association.>
